caption.p: Effect of the methanol extracts from A. austro-iranicum, A. serotinum and A. chlorostegium on ROS production in NCCIT cells exposed to H 2O 2. Cells were treated with H 2O 2 (200 μM) in the presence or absence of each plant extract at different concentrations (50, 100, 200 and 400 µg/ml). Data are means±SEM of three independent experiments. *p<0.05 as compared to H 2O 2-treated cells
